title: Dear Blueno
description: An anonymous forum for the Brown University community.

title: Cloth Simulation
description: Physically-based mass and spring cloth model evaluated using iterative constraint satisfaction.

title: Pathtracer
description: A C++ path-tracing renderer with global illumination, direct lighting, reflection, refraction, and textures.

title: Finite Element Simulation
description: Deforming solid objects by computing stress and strain, evaluating internal forces, and resolving collisions.
